citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:20 pm on
02-MAR-17.
Called and left voice message at 2:20 pm. Knocked on front door with no answer. Waited in driveway for 30
minutes.
